entry.name: clip
entry.title: Clip Effect
entry.desc: The clip effect will hide or show an element by clipping the element vertically or horizontally.

desc.p: The plane in which the clip effect will hide or show its element.
vertical clips the top and bottom edges, while horizontal clips the right and left edges.

example.desc: Toggle a div using the clip effect.
example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the box.
